name: Pseudo Dark Flexile SB
description: Use with SB's 'SpaceBattles.com' style, not 'Xenforo Default Style'. Just my attempt to make SB more eye friendly to some users. If you see something you thin needs changing, send me a message. Spacebattles: NuitTombee
additional_info: 3.0.0 - Added fixes to the Drop-Down menu colors. 2.2.1 - Cleaned up the code a bit. 2.2.0 - Changed the quick reply threadmark input background. 2.1.0 - A few more tweaks with the Threadmarks. 2.0.0 - Fixed the Threadmarks after their recent update. 1.5.0 - Made the New Message(s) notice legible. 1.4.0 - Changed quote header color so the original post link shows. 1.3.3 - I'm sure I'm using versioning wrong, cleaned up tab/spacing. 1.3.2 - Organized a bit more by changing all colors to HTML code. 1.3.1 - Added comments and organized the code a bit. 1.3.0 - The arrows on the quotes are still there, but I can't figure out how to change them from blue without changing all the other posted links. 1.2.0 - Recolored nav stuff. 1.1.0 - Fixed lists and some other stuff. 1.0.0 - Initial Upload
